proposal: Ever thought your NFTs could wear hats and earn you rewards? Eth Wif Hat does just that, transforming static art into dynamic assets within their ecosystem. Imagine strapping a 'Wif Hat' onto your NFTs and unlocking a new revenue stream, with holders like you—169 strong on the ETH network—earning up to 2% of all Ethereum transactions in their ecosystem. Need tools to expand this vision? Our DEX and Lottery solutions are perfect for communities aiming to innovate. Let's make those NFTs work harder!
